content: OpenAI has released GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1 Pro, and GPT-5.1 Codex Max.
The new OpenAI models, GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1 Pro, and GPT-5.1 Codex Max, feature compaction technology that allows for coherent work across millions of tokens.
The new OpenAI models, GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1 Pro, and GPT-5.1 Codex Max, enable long-running autonomous coding agents with significant token-efficiency gains.

Benchmarks, early reviews, and market reactions to OpenAI's new models (GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1 Pro, and GPT-5.1 Codex Max) indicate a shift in AI expectations towards specialized agentic workflows and longer capability time horizons.
